content.description: The graph shows a firm in a perfectly competitive industry. Assume all the firms in the industry have identical costs.
content.question: Given the price <math alttext="P sub 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, what is a firm’s profit-maximizing quantity of output?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
